means: 认为…是( attribute的过去式和过去分词 )
认为某事[物]属于某人[物]

sentence.Network_en: This, and the remaining frescoes, are not attributed to Giotto.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个，还有那些残存的湿壁画，都不是乔托的作品。

sentence.Network_en: She attributed her flawless complexion to the moisturiser she used.
sentence.Network_cn: 她将自己无瑕的肌肤归功于所使用的保湿霜。

sentence.Network_en: They attributed the success of their invention to Engineer Huang.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把发明的成功归于黄工程师.

PerfectNetExp.abs: is unbelievable and mostly attributed to the well skipper with beauty and wisdom ., 简直不敢相信 , 但是这些肯定归功于我们智慧与美貌并存的女船长汉娜.
You can add an attributed object only to an ATL project that uses attributes ., 只可向使用特性 ATL 项目添加特性化对象.
The American tenured professor system is attributed to academic freedom ., 美国终身教授制度缘于学术自由.
The Greeks attributed the misfortunes of men the antipathies and jealousies of gods and goddesses ., 古希腊人大抵把人类的不幸 , 归诸于神祗们的排斥和妒嫉.

list.abs: 属性（attribute）节点的 nodeName 是属性名称文本（text）节点的 nodeName 永远是 #text 文档（document）节点的 nodeName 永 …
特性（attribute）是被指定给某一声明的一则附加的声明性信息。 在C#中，有一个小的预定义特性集合。
归因(attribution)是指根据有关的外部信息、线索判断人的内在状态，或依据外在行为表现推测行为原因的过程，也称归因过程。海德 …

entry.def: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation.

example.ex: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
example.tran: 女性倾向于将她们的成功归因于外部因素，比如运气。

entry.tran: 将（品质或特征）加于…;认为…为…所有
entry.def: If you attribute a particular quality or feature to someone or something, you think that they have got it.

example.ex: People were beginning to attribute superhuman qualities to him.
example.tran: 人们开始觉得他超人一等。

entry.tran: 认为(文章、艺术品或评论）出自…
entry.def: If a piece of writing, a work of art, or a remark is attributed to someone, people say that they wrote it, created it, or said it.

example.ex: This, and the remaining frescoes, are not attributed to Giotto.
example.tran: 这个，还有那些残存的湿壁画，都不是乔托的作品。

example.ex: ...a Madonna and Child attributed to Pietro Lorenzetti.
example.tran: 被认为出自彼得罗·洛伦泽蒂之手的作品《圣母子》

entry.def: An attribute is a quality or feature that someone or something has.

example.ex: Cruelty is a normal attribute of human behaviour...
He has every attribute you could want and could play for any team.
example.tran: 他具备你想要的所有品质，放在哪个队都行。

auth_sentence.content: It is attributed to Einstein and is completely false.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is attributed to Einstein and is completely false.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is attributed to Einstein and is completely false.

auth_sentence.content: Further, they attributed all those factors to mankind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Further, they attributed all those factors to mankind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Further, they attributed all those factors to mankind.

auth_sentence.content: One attributed the postponement to an abundance of caution.
auth_sentence.res_content: One attributed the postponement to an abundance of caution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One attributed the postponement to an abundance of caution.
